name: Hexa Columns 2048 Puzzle: Drop n Merge Numbers
name_original: Hexa Columns 2048 Puzzle: Drop n Merge Numbers
description:
Hexagons columns 2048: drop and merge numbers is a brand new match-3 puzzle game. Just drop hexagon columns and merge numbers. It’s a relaxing and brain training 2048 numbers game.

Google Play Store: Hexa Columns 2048 Puzzle: Drop n Merge Numbers

Amazon App Store: Hexa Columns 2048 Puzzle: Drop n Merge Numbers

How to play:

- Direct and drop the falling hexagon columns using the 4 buttons.

- 3 or more same adjacent numbers will be merged so that their sum will be converted to the nearest number in the series [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, ..., 1024, 2048, ...]. The numbers are the repeated multiplication of number 2.

Simple rules:

- Every match gives 1 star.

- It costs 100 stars to remove a number from the board using the Delete button.

- The game is over when you run out of tries (no space for the falling columns to land) and stars.

- It is your responsibility to save your progress to resume it later by hitting the Save button.

Every new level: minimum and maximum generated numbers are increased. So try to match all minimum numbers before the next level because they will not be generated again.

There are 4 buttons at the bottom right of the screen. The right button is to direct the column to the right. The left button is to direct the column to the left. The bottom button is to direct the column to the bottom. The top button is to re-arrange the positions of numbers inside the fallen column.

The bigger the count of the same numbers, the bigger the score you can get.

Play, enjoy and have fun !
